item.title: Notes for MIT 6.824 Introduction
item.description: Introduction Goal Parallelism Fault Tolerance Physical Security / Isolated Hide the distributed nature; Build an interface that looks an application like a non-distributed system ; Challenge Concurrent program Complex interactions Timing-dependent stuff Network Failure / Partial Failure Performance Infrastructure/Abstractions Storage Communication eg:RPC Computation eg: MapReduce Implementation RPC, Threads, concurrency control Topic Performance Scalability : 2x computers -> 2x throughput Fault Tolerance
